text: (taṇa koḷa) miṭak ataṭa gena emagin (obagē birin̆daṭa) gasanu. oba, (obagē) daruvanva kaḍā bin̆da nodamanu” (yayi kīvemu). niyata vaśayenma api ohuva itāmat ivasilivantayeku vaśayenma duṭuvemu. (ohu itāmat) hon̆da vahaleki. niyata vaśayenma ohu (sǣma kāraṇāvakadīma apa desa) balā siṭinneku vaśayenma siṭiyēya
